title: One Nation Innovation
subtitle: How we designed the One Nation Innovation landing page to showcase government-hosted challenges resulting in a streamlined user experience that simplifies the discovery of relevant challenges and drives engagement.

about.name: One Nation Innovation
about.desc: One Nation Innovation platform aims to present open challenges hosted by government improving public services where problem-solvers propose innovative solutions, driving higher quality and efficiency

projectTeam.desc: The project’s design took 5 days to complete. The project team consisted of one UI designer.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Problem?
projectDetails_1.desc: Client wanted to build Landing Page that helps in presenting the challenges held by the government online.

projectDetails_1.heading: What were the Goals?
projectDetails_1.desc: Design the landing page showcasing challenges hosted on the platform along with features to help users search challenges based on their preference.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Solution?
projectDetails_1.desc: The final design highlights the challenges section, incorporating filters and a search function to help users easily explore and find relevant challenges.

projectDetails_2.heading: User Interface and Product Outlook
projectDetails_2.desc: The design features a clean look using gold, navy blue, and black, combined with professional 'DM Sans' typography, creating a minimal and organized aesthetic for the landing page.

projectDetails_3.heading: Conclusion
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Successfully designed the landing page that effectively organizes and presents challenges, improving user experience with easy search and filter options.

projectDetails_3.heading: Client Feedback
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Re-designed the entire oni app with a fresh outlook of minimalist and simpler user interface.
  • The new design improves usability and enhances oni’s image as a reliable platform for connecting users with contractors and suppliers.
